- [ ] Bug fix

## Checklist

- [ ] Tests pass (`pytest`)
- [ ] Type annotations complete and `mypy` passes
- [ ] `ruff check` reports no issues
- [ ] `ruff format` applied
- [ ] Docstrings updated for any changed public API
- [ ] `CHANGELOG.md` updated under `[Unreleased]`
- [ ] No placeholder URLs, hardcoded paths, or debug print statements
